content: “While I hesitated to make this announcement a day before Easter,” said Director Comey, “we felt the stunning news about the president’s real identity must be shared with the public immediately so the American people can decide what actions to take to limit the destruction of a Lucifer Proxy who rules supreme in the hallways of power. Make no mistake about it, a man this evil could end life on the planet without even batting a satanic eyelash.”
